title: Download the new client
body: Guys, it've been a long time since I last play League, now I want to reinstall it, but I can't find where to download the new client, the button on this website only show me the link to old client. Please help.

replies.body: **[This Link](https://signup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload)** should do the trick for ya!
